author: Algirdas Mulevicius
description: “The inspiration behind “Doremi” is music, because I am a musician myself. As a bartender, I usually work with music in the background - the way a great melody makes a song is similar to how a great combination of ingredients makes a cocktail. And a few great cocktails make a great evening for your customer  - the most important thing for any bartender!“So this drink is inspired by the small things that combine to become great things – much like music, bartending is an art and bartenders are artists in their own way.”
name: Doremi

recipeInstructions.text: MIST chilled glass with Becherovka and set aside
SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into misted glass
